subject: Water Damage Warranty Claim - BLD-2000 Pro-Salon
body:
Hello,

I need to file a warranty claim for my BreezeLite BLD-2000 Pro-Salon hairdryer that I purchased on April 15, 2026.

Unfortunately, the hairdryer was accidentally knocked into a sink full of water during a busy Saturday at my salon. I immediately unplugged it and let it dry for 24 hours before attempting to use it again.

When I turned it on, there was no power and the motor made a clicking sound. The water likely damaged the internal electrical components.

I have the purchase receipt and photos of the water-damaged hairdryer. I'm hoping this can be covered under warranty.

Thank you,
James Mitchell
james.mitchell@salon.com
